subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में पहली मंत्रालय क्या है?
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous palace located in Jaipur, known for its unique design featuring wind towers.
explanation_hi: हवा महाल, Jaipur mein जाने का अल्पांक भविष्यति में जाने
